alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Weber... southern Box Elder...west central Salt Lake...western Davis and Tooele Counties through 800 PM MDT... At 658 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of showers producing gusty outflow winds along a cold front along a line extending from 7 miles north of Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway to 9 miles north of Clive to 15 miles east of Ibapah. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Observed. IMPACT...Gusty winds will result in difficult driving conditions along I-80 and suddenly higher winds and waves on the Great Salt Lake. Locations impacted include... Tooele, Grantsville, Wendover, Dugway English Village, Stansbury Park, Hooper, Delle, Tooele Army Depot, Clive, Utah Test and Training Range South, Knolls, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Utah Test and Training Range North, Ibapah, Skull Valley, Great Salt Lake North of the Causeway, Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway, Fish Springs Wildlife Refuge, Hat Island and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 0 and 102. Utah Route 30 between mile markers 0 and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Northern Wasatch Front; Tooele and Rush Valleys
